title: PacketsPerSecond
extract: Packets per second (PPS) is one of the most important measurements to consider when planning a DDoS defense strategy and evaluating solutions. ... In DDoS, an attacker's strategy is asynchronous, meaning the attacker attempts to do as little work as possible while making their target do a lot of work.Jun 27, 2017
